```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(viridis)
```

```{r}
gp <- readxl::read_xlsx('growth_profiles_binary.xlsx')

dat <- select(gp, -strain)
rownames(dat) <- gp$strain

pheatmap::pheatmap(t(dat),
                   cluster_rows = FALSE,
                   color = viridis(2))
```
